name: RCA LED32C45RQ 32" 1080p 60Hz Class LED (3.1" ultra-slim) HDTV

reviews.name: RCA LED32C45RQ 32" 1080p 60Hz Class LED (3.1" ultra-slim) HDTV
reviews.reviewText: This was a good buy for me, and has the features I needed, specifically an input for headphones. I nearly bought another model that supposedly had more bells and whistles, but was surprised that it didn't have an input for headphones. The picture is as good as my much more costly Sony 32" and Sharp 40". I'm a happy camper, and you will be to, if you buy one.
reviews.title: Great Price, Great Picture

reviews.name: RCA LED32C45RQ 32" 1080p 60Hz Class LED (3.1" ultra-slim) HDTV
reviews.reviewText: This product is true to it's word, and the price was especially amazing for a 1080p. I love it. It was so easy to set up. The minute I set it up, the DirecTV programming was synced immediately without me doing anything. I was extremely surprised. I only had to do minor adjustments to the picture, but it is beautiful. Now, I spend more time lounging in my bedroom, just because I love looking at my new TV. Thank you...
reviews.title: Great deal on an RCA TV

reviews.name: RCA LED32C45RQ 32" 1080p 60Hz Class LED (3.1" ultra-slim) HDTV
reviews.reviewText: The movers broke my old, analog tv so I ordered this one at Walmart.com. It is exactly as described and was delivered free to my door. Not a high end tv but I am a senior citizen who is only interested in watching tv on a tv. Fits the bill
reviews.title: Good TV

reviews.name: RCA LED32C45RQ 32" 1080p 60Hz Class LED (3.1" ultra-slim) HDTV
reviews.reviewText: Great TV for our small bedroom, the only issue is not compatible with DirecTV, so I need to use two remote controls, one for the volume and the other one to change channels
reviews.title: 27 July 2013

reviews.name: RCA LED32C45RQ 32" 1080p 60Hz Class LED (3.1" ultra-slim) HDTV
reviews.reviewText:
I bought this TV to use as a computer monitor as it has met all of my expectations. 32" ended up being almost too big but it's still great. Sometimes text is somewhat blurred but it is corrected if I lean back in my chair. The 1080p HD is great, very noticeable as soon as I plugged it in. The sound is much better than my cheap computer speakers.

One unexpected benefit is the TV will shut off if there is no signal to the monitor after a period of time, so when my PC goes to sleep, the monitor will, too.

Would definitely recommend. Start playing a game and the minor text issue will be long forgotten.
reviews.title: Good for computer monitor
